title: Danish design
creator_credit: Danish Society of Arts and Crafts and Independent Designers and Brandon Films
brief_description: Danish contemporary art and design. Examples of the best known furniture designers, fabrics, silverware and kitchen utensils, illustrate Danish functionalism inspired by craft traditions, art and culture of other countries. A skilled craftsman is shown making a chair.
creator_credit_for_label: Danish Society of Arts and Crafts and Independent Designers and Brandon Films
